scripts.test-docker: node latest: docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.latest up && docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.latest down -v
scripts.test-docker: node lts: docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.lts up && docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.lts down -v
scripts.test-docker: node v18.16: docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.n18-16 up && docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.n18-16 down -v
scripts.test-docker: node v16.20: docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.n16-20 up && docker compose --env-file ./docker/test/.env.n16-20 down -v
